code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[roomName,setRoomName]=useState('');const[playerName,setPlayerName]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleJoinRoom=()=>{if(roomName.trim()&&playerName.trim()){navigate(`/room/${roomName}?player=${playerName}`);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Red Tetris"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"join-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Room Name",value:roomName,onChange:e=>setRoomName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Player Name",value:playerName,onChange:e=>setPlayerName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleJoinRoom,children:"Join Room"})]})]});};export default Home;
